00020 #ifndef _RTDM_CORE_H
00021 #define _RTDM_CORE_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/pod.h>
00024 #include <rtdm/rtdm_driver.h>
00025 
00026 
00027 #define DEF_FILDES_COUNT    64  /* default number of file descriptors */
00028 
00029 
00030 struct rtdm_fildes {
00031     struct rtdm_fildes                  *next;
00032     volatile struct rtdm_dev_context    *context;
00033 };
00034 
00035 
00036 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00037 extern xnlock_t             rt_fildes_lock;
00038 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00039 
00040 extern unsigned int         fd_count;
00041 extern struct rtdm_fildes   *fildes_table;
00042 extern int                  open_fildes;
00043 
00044 
00045 int __init rtdm_core_init(void);
00046 
00047 static inline void rtdm_core_cleanup(void)
00048 {
00049     kfree(fildes_table);
00050 }

00052 #endif /* _RTDM_CORE_H */
